select * from (select a.*, DISTNACE_WGS84(126.78803180000001, 37.4372839, S_Y, S_X) as distance, (select count(*) from review where s_no=a.s_no) as S_REVIEWCOUNT, (select TRUNC((r_score_taste+r_score_amount+r_score_delivery)/3,2) from review where s_no=a.s_no) as S_SCORE from (select * from store)a) where 1=1
and s_no in(select s_no from store_category where ct_no = (select ct_no from category where ct_name=#{category}))
and s_name LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
and distance<5
order by S_REVIEWCOUNT DESC
order by S_SCORE DESC
